q_en: What are the raw materials with non zero inventory in all of our warehouses, organized in the form of 'Type: Remaining Quantity'?

steps.sql: SELECT m.name, SUM(wm.left_number) as remaining_quantity FROM warehouse_material wm JOIN materials m ON wm.material_id = m.id WHERE m.type = 'origin' AND wm.left_number > 0 GROUP BY m.name;
steps.description: Retrieve the names and remaining quantities of raw materials with non-zero inventory from all warehouses

response:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the raw materials with non-zero inventory in all of our warehouses. Here's the organized list in the form of 'Type: Remaining Quantity':

| Type             | Remaining Quantity |
|------------------|--------------------|
| Cotton Fabric    | 3500               |
| Denim Fabric     | 4500               |
| Down             | 1230               |
| Down Pieces      | 2420               |
| Leather          | 2200               |
| Silk             | 1100               |
| Synthetic Fiber  | 2300               |
| Wool             | 4100               |

Isn't it great to see all these materials ready to go? ðŸ˜„ If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!
